actions.text: Reported to House from the Committee on Rules, H. Rept. 96-717.
Measure called up by unanimous consent in House.

official_title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on H.R. 2440, a bill to repeal the prohibition against the expenditure of certain discretionary funds under the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970.

summary.text: Waives certain points of order against the conference report on H.R. 2440 (Airport and airway development).

titles.title: A resolution waiving certain points of order against the conference report on H.R. 2440, a bill to repeal the prohibition against the expenditure of certain discretionary funds under the Airport and Airway Development Act of 1970.
